intro.description: This cheat sheet will show you how to connect Tracker Desktop to a Tag ID Reader and map Tag ID reads to Animals and Events.

item.title: Open Readers View
item.description: Open the Readers view in the workbench.

item.title: Start the Add a Reader Wizard
item.description: Start the Add an Event Reader Wizard to add a new Reader to the Readers view.

item.title: Answer Wizard Dialogs
item.description: Respond to Add an Event Reader Wizard dialogs.

subitem.label: Select an Animal Document for mapping Animals and Events to Reader Tag IDs
Select the type of Reader and respond to all dialog questions specific to the Reader Type.

item.title: Start the Reader
item.description:
The Reader you added will show up as a new row in the Readers view.
Check the start box in the first column of the row to start the connection to the Reader.
